title: Hamas Attack Provides “Rare Opportunity” to Cleanse Gaza, Israeli Think Tank Says
description:
Echoing George W. Bush on 9/11, a Misgav Institute report shows how political leaders find a chilling silver lining in the suffering of their own.

The post Hamas Attack Provides “Rare Opportunity” to Cleanse Gaza, Israeli Think Tank Says appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Inside the Campaign That Put an Oil Boss in Charge of a Climate Summit
description:
Sultan Al Jaber, CEO of the UAE’s national oil company, secured the COP28 presidency despite questions over his green credentials.

The post Inside the Campaign That Put an Oil Boss in Charge of a Climate Summit appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Death Toll in Gaza Now Exceeds 5,000
description:
Yousef Munayyer joins Jeremy Scahill and Murtaza Hussain to discuss how the political and regional implications of the war in Palestine extend far beyond its borders.

The post Death Toll in Gaza Now Exceeds 5,000 appeared first on The Intercept.
